main.name: Yonatan Mahluf
main.description: React Full Stack Web Developer with 1 year experience.
main.description2: I am hard-worker and Fast learner.
main.bio: My name is Yonatan, I am 28 years old, most of my life I have been involved in computers whether it is disassembling an assembly or upgrading hardware and software systems, today I am in my fourth year at Sami Shamoon College majoring in Cyber security field, I am currently studying independently Web development (Server side : React.Js,React native) and (Client side : NodeJs,Express,Django,Python DB:MongoDB,FireBase).Currently, I am available for any type of job that will challenge me and give me more experience in the software world.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
